attributes.action: Open the UK Borders unconditionally to Ukrainian refugees Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
The Republic of Ireland, Poland and others have shown Humanity and Compassion in opening their borders and taking on the burden of refugees fleeing for their very lives.
The UK's current policy is shameful and shows zero compassion or understanding.
Our Policy should reflect that of more civilised countries and MUST, NOW!
attributes.background: Revoke the "only if they have family here" clause re : refugees from Ukraine; open a Safe and Legal route to the UK for refugees fleeing the Russian Aggression in Ukraine; accept whoever requires aid and make the changes immediately.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434

Grant Ukrainians, who have over-stayed their visas, leave to remain: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609716
